column1: Manual disengagement as the AV had hardware irregularity. The HMI (human machine interface) of the AV system demonstrated abnormal behavior, causing the safety operator manually disengaged the AV.
Manual disengagement after a scooter made contact with the AV.
The AV system exited autonomous mode due to hardware irregularity. While the car crossed a bumpy intersection, the AV system detected abnormal car status data, causing it to exit autonomous mode.
